actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 102 of the National Security Act of 1947, as amended, to prohibit domestic intelligence activities by the Central Intelligence Agency.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits, under the provisions of the National Security Act of 1947, domestic intelligence activities by the Central Intelligence Agency.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 102 of the National Security Act of 1947, as amended, to prohibit domestic intelligence activities by the Central Intelligence Agency.
